snippet: For L’Arpeggiata, an ensemble with shifting personnel, anything goes when it comes to early music, and clever use of anachronistic touches is not frowned upon.
abstract: L'Arpeggiata, an early-music ensemble with a rotating cast of musicians, is set to perform four concerts as part of a Carnegie Perspectives series at Zankel Hall; much of the performance will draw from the group's latest CD, Los Pajaros Perdidos.
lead_paragraph: For L’Arpeggiata, an ensemble with shifting personnel, anything goes when it comes to early music, and clever use of anachronistic touches is not frowned upon.

headline.seo: L’Arpeggiata to Bring Its Early Music to Carnegie Hall
